name: Wall Breaker
description:
Breakout Survival game! Compete with others and break the wall as it falls! See how long you last and how many bricks you broke before your demise!

Just like in life - there is no such thing as winners or losers. Only try and try harder.

Controls: 
-----------------------------------------------
Mouse           -  Control the paddle
Space/click -  Release ball
Esc                   - Pauses game
Alt+F4           - Closes your application
Win                 - Brings up your start Menu

Level Guide
__________________________________________

1 - Dark Side -
                         Intro to this style of game.
2 - Teecher -
                         Powerup blocks
3 - Brik en d wahl -
                         Boss and Dialog
4 - Cover and time! -
                         Compete with others and break the wall as it falls! See how long you last and how many bricks you broke before your demise!
